subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: United States midfielder Sacha Kljestan, who had to defend his mustache in a recent Champions League game, is trying to find playing time with the national team at a loaded position.
snippet: United States midfielder Sacha Kljestan, who had to defend his mustache in a recent Champions League game, is trying to find playing time with the national team at a loaded position.
